name: Spatial University
tag_list: online, training, education, class, hcm, university, iphone, course, learning
overview:
Spatial University is dedicated to develop a platform that provides online classroom training to help students get maximum value for their investment in professional education. We provide platform to qualified instructors who want to offer professional courses to students around the globe. Spatial University has been established with the primary objective of offering superior software and non- software courses for different peoples. The courses are specifically designed keeping the working professionals in view to sharpen and adding an edge to their skill sets. The courses are flexible, affordable, convenient, synchronized and adaptive as per the situation.

Spatial University is influenced by our group site Spatial Consulting. Spatial Consulting was established in 2004, with the purpose of helping companies realize maximum return on their investments in HCM software. Management at Spatial Consulting has experience in managing implementation, steady state support and outsourcing of HCM projects for PeopleSoft HCM, Kronos and Workbrain for various Fortune 200 clients (including CVS and JC Penneys).
